title: 107_hr344
content: The Act titled "Social Security Disability Waiting Period Elimination Act of 2001" eliminates the 5-month waiting period for disability benefits. The Social Security Act is amended to eliminate the waiting period for disability insurance benefits. The Social Security Act is amended to eliminate the waiting period for disability insurance benefits, including the removal of a defined term in section 223(c)(2) of the Act. Conforming amendments are made to section 223(c) and section 223(c)(1) of the Act. The Social Security Act is amended to eliminate the waiting period for disability insurance benefits and make adjustments to widow's and widower's insurance benefits based on disability. The Social Security Act is amended to eliminate the waiting period for disability insurance benefits and adjust widow's and widower's insurance benefits based on disability by redesignating paragraphs and eliminating defined terms. The Social Security Act is amended to eliminate waiting periods for disability benefits and Medicare disability benefits. The Social Security Act is amended to remove waiting periods for disability benefits and Medicare disability benefits, including changes to entitlement requirements under Section 226(b). The Social Security Act is amended to remove waiting periods for disability benefits and Medicare disability benefits, including changes to entitlement requirements. This includes striking specific language related to entitlement duration in various sections of the Act. The Social Security Act is amended to remove waiting periods for disability benefits and Medicare disability benefits, including changes to entitlement requirements. Specific language related to entitlement duration is struck from various sections of the Act. The Social Security Act is amended to remove waiting periods for disability benefits and Medicare disability benefits, including changes to entitlement requirements. Specific language related to entitlement duration is struck from various sections of the Act. Effective dates are outlined in Section 5. The amendments in this Act apply to disability benefits under the Social Security Act, with specific effective dates outlined for different sections. The amendments in this Act apply to disability benefits under the Social Security Act, with specific effective dates outlined for different sections. The amendments made by section 4 apply to insurance benefits under title XVIII of the Social Security Act for items and services furnished at least 90 days after the enactment of this Act.
